summary:
• The far-right party is expected to perform well in upcoming French elections.
• Antisemitic and racist sentiments remain present within the rebranded far-right movement in France.
• The far-right party is currently leading in French election polls.

• The US Department of Homeland Security has extended Temporary Protected Status (TPS) to Haitian nationals due to ongoing political instability in their home country.
• This decision will allow eligible Haitians to remain in the United States temporarily without fear of deportation or becoming undocumented immigrants.
• The extension aims to provide relief and support to those affected by the crisis until conditions improve back in Haiti.

• Iran's presidential election has moved to a run-off due to low voter turnout.
• The run-off will feature a reformist candidate against a conservative one.
• Iran extended its voting hours in the snap election for a new president.

• A possible massacre occurred during anti-tax protests in Kenya.
• The exact number of deaths is unknown due to conflicting reports.
• Authorities have launched an investigation into the incident.

• At least 18 people were killed in explosions in northern Nigeria.
• The incident occurred in multiple locations across the region.
• Authorities are investigating the cause behind the attacks.

• A Serbian officer was shot with a crossbow outside an embassy.
• The incident occurred near an Israeli embassy in Serbia.
• The motives behind the attack remain unclear.

• Four people died
• From bottles found in the sea 
• They drank from these bottles

• Switzerland defeated Italy in the quarterfinals.
• They reached the Euro 2024 quarterfinals.
• This was an upset win for Switzerland over Italy.

• Young Syrian women face an uncertain future upon returning home due to widespread destruction and violence.
• The devastating impact of conflict on their communities has left them anxious about their safety and well-being.
• Their fears are exacerbated by the lack of basic necessities like shelter, food, and healthcare in post-conflict zones.

• Zelensky requests long-range weapons due to attacks.
• Marines defend Kharkiv despite lack of preparation.
• Civilians enjoy leisure activities amidst bombing threats.

• Joe Biden rejects calls to step down amid criticism over his debate performance.
• The public reacts to the outcome of the presidential debate between Biden and Donald Trump.
• Tropical Storm Beryl is expected to cause disruptions across the eastern seaboard.
